Properties.ProtectedString:
--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle") Mesh = Handle:WaitForChild("Mesh")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
EggScript = script:WaitForChild("EggScript"):Clone()
BaseUrl = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id="
Sounds = { SlingRelease = Handle:WaitForChild("SlingRelease"), }
MeshData = { GunWithSling = "223833506", Gun = "223833668", Sling = "223833582", Egg = "225334624", TextureId = "223833747", }
Duration = 0.75 ReloadTime = 4
for i, v in pairs(MeshData) do MeshData[i] = (BaseUrl .. v) end
BasePart = Instance.new("Part") BasePart.Material = Enum.Material.Plastic BasePart.Shape = Enum.PartType.Block BasePart.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth BasePart.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth BasePart.FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom BasePart.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, 0.2) BasePart.Locked = true BasePart.CanCollide = true BasePart.Anchored = false
Egg = BasePart:Clone() Egg.Name = "Egg" Egg.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Institutional white") Egg.Size = Vector3.new(0.5, 0.6, 0.5) EggMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") EggMesh.Name = "Mesh" EggMesh.MeshType = Enum.MeshType.FileMesh EggMesh.MeshId = MeshData.Egg EggMesh.TextureId = "" EggMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(0.55, 0.55, 0.55) EggMesh.VertexColor = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1) EggMesh.Offset = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) EggMesh.Parent = Egg
Sling = BasePart:Clone() Sling.Name = "Sling" Sling.Size = Vector3.new(0.5, 0.75, 2.75) Sling.CanCollide = false SlingMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") SlingMesh.Name = "Mesh" SlingMesh.MeshType = Enum.MeshType.FileMesh SlingMesh.MeshId = MeshData.Sling SlingMesh.TextureId = MeshData.TextureId SlingMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(0.65, 0.65, 0.65) SlingMesh.VertexColor = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1) SlingMesh.Offset = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) SlingMesh.Parent = Sling
Rate = (1 / 60) Gravity = 196.20
EggReady = true ToolEquipped = false
RemoteFunctions = Tool:WaitForChild("RemoteFunctions")
ServerControl = (RemoteFunctions:FindFirstChild("ServerControl") or Instance.new("RemoteFunction")) ServerControl.Name = "ServerControl" ServerControl.Parent = RemoteFunctions
ClientControl = (RemoteFunctions:FindFirstChild("ClientControl") or Instance.new("RemoteFunction")) ClientControl.Name = "ClientControl" ClientControl.Parent = RemoteFunctions
Mesh.MeshId = MeshData.GunWithSling Handle.Transparency = 0 Tool.Enabled = true
function CreateEgg() if not ToolEquipped or not SlingClone or not SlingClone.Parent then return end if EggClone and EggClone.Parent then EggClone:Destroy() end EggClone = Egg:Clone() local EggWeld = Instance.new("Weld") EggWeld.Part0 = SlingClone EggWeld.Part1 = EggClone EggWeld.C0 = CFrame.new(0, 0.15, 0.8) EggWeld.Parent = EggClone EggClone.Parent = Tool end
function ManageSling(Create) for i, v in pairs(Tool:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("BasePart") and v ~= Handle then v:Destroy() end end if Create then Mesh.MeshId = MeshData.Gun SlingClone = Sling:Clone() SlingMotor = Instance.new("Motor6D") SlingMotor.MaxVelocity = 0.25 SlingMotor.Part0 = Handle SlingMotor.Part1 = SlingClone SlingMotor.C0 = CFrame.new(0.0785072446, 0.188826829, -1.54037094, -4.37113883e-008, 0, -1, 0, 1, 0, 1, 0, -4.37113883e-008) SlingMotor.C1 = CFrame.new(0.078507781, -0.286166668, -1.31539106, -1.34110451e-007, -4.65661287e-010, -0.999999046, -1.39698386e-008, 0.999999404, -2.32830644e-010, 1.00000083, -1.95577741e-008, 7.4505806e-008) SlingMotor.Parent = SlingClone SlingClone.Parent = Tool end end
function CheckIfAlive() return (((Character and Character.Parent and Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent and Humanoid.Health > 0 and Player and Player.Parent) and true) or false) end
function Activated() if not Tool.Enabled or not CheckIfAlive() or not ToolEquipped or not EggReady then return end if not SlingClone or not SlingClone.Parent or not SlingMotor or not SlingMotor.Parent then return end Tool.Enabled = false EggReady = false Sounds.SlingRelease.Pitch = (math.random(900, 1200) * 0.001) Sounds.SlingRelease:Play() SlingMotor.DesiredAngle = (math.random(500, 750) * 0.001) if EggClone and EggClone.Parent then Spawn(function() local MousePosition = InvokeClient("MousePosition").Position local EggCFrame = EggClone.CFrame local Direction = CFrame.new(EggCFrame.p, MousePosition) EggClone:Destroy() local LaunchedEgg = Egg:Clone() LaunchedEgg.CFrame = EggCFrame local BodyGyro = Instance.new("BodyGyro") BodyGyro.maxTorque = Vector3.new(math.huge, math.huge, math.huge) BodyGyro.cframe = Direction BodyGyro.Parent = LaunchedEgg local EggScriptClone = EggScript:Clone() local Creator = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator.Name = "Creator" Creator.Value = Player Creator.Parent = EggScriptClone EggScriptClone.Disabled = false EggScriptClone.Parent = LaunchedEgg
local Velocity = (Direction.lookVector * 200) LaunchedEgg.Velocity = Velocity
Debris:AddItem(LaunchedEgg, 5) LaunchedEgg.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace") end) end Delay(Duration, (function() SlingMotor.DesiredAngle = 0 end)) wait(ReloadTime) CreateEgg() wait(Rate) EggReady = true Tool.Enabled = true end
function Equipped() Character = Tool.Parent Humanoid = nil for i, v in pairs(Character:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("Humanoid") then Humanoid = v break end end Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) if not CheckIfAlive() then return end ToolEquipped = true Spawn(function() ManageSling(true) if EggReady then CreateEgg() end end) end
function Unequipped() Mesh.MeshId = MeshData.GunWithSling ManageSling(false) ToolEquipped = false end
function InvokeClient(Mode, Value) local ClientReturn = nil pcall(function() ClientReturn = ClientControl:InvokeClient(Player, Mode, Value) end) return ClientReturn end
--[[function OnServerInvoke(player, mode, value) if player ~= Player or not ToolEquipped or not CheckIfAlive() then return end end
ServerControl.OnServerInvoke = OnServerInvoke]]
ManageSling(false)
Tool.Activated:connect(Activated) Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Part = script.Parent
Players = game:GetService("Players") InsertService = game:GetService("InsertService") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
EggSplatModel = InsertService:LoadAsset(228153674) EggSplat = EggSplatModel:GetChildren()[1]:Clone() if EggSplatModel and EggSplatModel.Parent then Debris:AddItem(EggSplatModel, 1) end EggSplat.Anchored = false
EggSplatScript = script:WaitForChild("EggSplatScript")
Images = {225903962, 225904058, 225904105, 225904147, 225904216}
BaseUrl = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id="
Sounds = { EggSplat = script:WaitForChild("EggSplat"), EggCrack = script:WaitForChild("EggCrack"), }
Broken = false
ProjectileNames = {"Water", "Arrow", "Projectile", "Effect", "Rail", "Laser", "Bullet", "Egg"}
Rate = (1 / 60)
Creator = script:WaitForChild("Creator")
function CheckTableForString(Table, String) for i, v in pairs(Table) do if string.find(string.lower(String), string.lower(v)) then return true end end return false end
function CheckIntangible(Hit) if Hit and Hit.Parent then if Hit.Transparency > 0.8 or not Hit.CanCollide or CheckTableForString(ProjectileNames, Hit.Name) or Hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") then return true end end return false end
function CastRay(StartPos, Vec, Length, Ignore, DelayIfHit) local Ignore = ((type(Ignore) == "table" and Ignore) or {Ignore}) local RayHit, RayPos, RayNormal = game:GetService("Workspace"):FindPartOnRayWithIgnoreList(Ray.new(StartPos, Vec * Length), Ignore) if RayHit and CheckIntangible(RayHit) then if DelayIfHit then wait() end RayHit, RayPos, RayNormal = CastRay((RayPos + (Vec * 0.01)), Vec, (Length - ((StartPos - RayPos).magnitude)), Ignore, DelayIfHit) end return RayHit, RayPos, RayNormal end
function CreateEggSplatter(Hit) local EggSplatClone = EggSplat:Clone() local EggSplatScriptClone = EggSplatScript:Clone() local CreatorClone = Creator:Clone() CreatorClone.Value = Creator.Value CreatorClone.Parent = EggSplatScriptClone EggSplatScriptClone.Disabled = false EggSplatScriptClone.Parent = EggSplatClone EggSplatClone.Size = (EggSplatClone.Size * (math.random(50, 200) * 0.01)) if Hit and Hit.Object and Hit.Object.Parent and Hit.RayData then local PartCFrame = CFrame.new(Hit.RayData.RayPos, (CFrame.new(Hit.RayData.RayPos) + Hit.RayData.RayNormal * 2).p) * CFrame.Angles(-(math.pi / 2), (math.random(-360, 360) * 0.01), 0) PartCFrame = (PartCFrame * CFrame.new(0, (EggSplatClone.Size.Y / 1), 0)) local Weld = Instance.new("Motor") Weld.Name = "Weld" Weld.Part0 = EggSplatClone Weld.Part1 = Hit.Object Weld.C0 = PartCFrame:inverse() Weld.C1 = Hit.Object.CFrame:inverse() Weld.Parent = EggSplatClone Debris:AddItem(EggSplatClone, 10) EggSplatClone.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace") end end
function CoverScreen(player) local PlayerGui = player:FindFirstChild("PlayerGui") if PlayerGui then
local ScreenGui = Instance.new("ScreenGui") ScreenGui.Name = "SlimeSplatter" local MainFrame = Instance.new("Frame") MainFrame.Name = "Splater" MainFrame.Position = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0, 0) MainFrame.Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 1, 0) MainFrame.BackgroundColor = BrickColor.new(1, 1, 1) MainFrame.Transparency = 1 MainFrame.BorderColor = BrickColor.new(1, 1, 1) MainFrame.Parent = ScreenGui
for i = 1, math.random(1, 4) do local Splatter = Instance.new("ImageLabel") local Size = ((math.random() * 1) + 0.25) Splatter.Size = UDim2.new(Size, 0, Size, 0) Splatter.Position = UDim2.new((math.random() - (Size / 2)), 0, (math.random() - (Size / 2)), 0) Splatter.SizeConstraint = Enum.SizeConstraint.RelativeXX Splatter.Transparency = 1 Splatter.Image = (BaseUrl .. Images[math.random(1, #Images)]) Splatter.Parent = MainFrame Splatter.Rotation = math.random(0, 360) Debris:AddItem(Splatter, (5 + (math.random() * 2))) end
Debris:AddItem(ScreenGui, 5)
ScreenGui.Parent = PlayerGui
end end
function Splat(Hit) if not Hit or not Hit.Parent or Broken then return end local Player = Creator.Value local Character = (((Player and Player.Parent and Player:IsA("Player") and Player.Character) and Player.Character) or nil) local HumanoidHit = false local character = Hit.Parent if character:IsA("Accessory") then character = Hit.Parent end if character == Character or character.Parent == Character then return end local humanoid = character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 then local player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(character) if player and player ~= Player then CoverScreen(player) end local HumanoidHit = true end if HumanoidHit then local Sound = Sounds.EggSplat:Clone() Sound.Pitch = (math.random(1500, 2500) * 0.001) Sound.Parent = Part Sound:Play() else local Sound = Sounds.EggCrack:Clone() Sound.Pitch = (math.random(1000, 1500) * 0.001) Sound.Parent = Part Sound:Play() local RayHit, RayPos, RayNormal = CastRay(Part.Position, (Part.Velocity.unit * -1), ((Part.Size.Y / 2) + 10), {Part}, false) if RayHit then Spawn(function() CreateEggSplatter({Object = RayHit, RayData = {RayPos = RayPos, RayNormal = RayNormal}}) end) end end Part.Transparency = 1 Part.CanCollide = false Part.Anchored = true Broken = true Debris:AddItem(Part, 2) end
Part.Touched:connect(Splat)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Part = script.Parent
Players = game:GetService("Players")
SlowScript = script:WaitForChild("SlowScript")
Creator = script:WaitForChild("Creator")
function Splat(Hit) if not Hit or not Hit.Parent then return end local Player = Creator.Value local Character = (((Player and Player.Parent and Player:IsA("Player") and Player.Character) and Player.Character) or nil) local HumanoidHit = false local character = Hit.Parent if character:IsA("Accessory") then character = Hit.Parent end if character == Character or character.Parent == Character then return end local humanoid = character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if not humanoid or humanoid.Health == 0 then return end local SlowScriptClone = character:FindFirstChild(SlowScript.Name) if not SlowScriptClone then SlowScriptClone = SlowScript:Clone() local Duration = Instance.new("NumberValue") Duration.Name = "Duration" Duration.Parent = SlowScriptClone end SlowScriptClone.Duration.Value = 5 SlowScriptClone.Disabled = false SlowScriptClone.Parent = character end
Part.Touched:connect(Splat)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Character = script.Parent Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
Duration = script:WaitForChild("Duration")
Rate = (1 / 60)
Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 6
while Duration.Value > 0 do local Time = wait(Rate) Duration.Value = (Duration.Value - Time) wait(Rate) end
Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16
script:Destroy()

--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players")
Animations = {}
RemoteFunctions = Tool:WaitForChild("RemoteFunctions") ServerControl = RemoteFunctions:WaitForChild("ServerControl") ClientControl = RemoteFunctions:WaitForChild("ClientControl")
ToolEquipped = false
function SetAnimation(mode, value) if mode == "PlayAnimation" and value and ToolEquipped and Humanoid then for i, v in pairs(Animations) do if v.Animation == value.Animation then v.AnimationTrack:Stop() table.remove(Animations, i) end end local AnimationTrack = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(value.Animation) table.insert(Animations, {Animation = value.Animation, AnimationTrack = AnimationTrack}) AnimationTrack:Play(value.FadeTime, value.Weight, value.Speed) elseif mode == "StopAnimation" and value then for i, v in pairs(Animations) do if v.Animation == value.Animation then v.AnimationTrack:Stop() table.remove(Animations, i) end end end end
function CheckIfAlive() return (((Character and Character.Parent and Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent and Humanoid.Health > 0 and Player and Player.Parent) and true) or false) end
function Equipped(Mouse) Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = nil for i, v in pairs(Character:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("Humanoid") then Humanoid = v break end end if not CheckIfAlive() then return end PlayerMouse = Player:GetMouse() ToolEquipped = true end
function Unequipped() ToolEquipped = false for i, v in pairs(Animations) do if v and v.AnimationTrack then v.AnimationTrack:Stop() end end Animations = {} end
function InvokeServer(mode, value) local ServerReturn pcall(function() ServerReturn = ServerControl:InvokeServer(mode, value) end) return ServerReturn end
function OnClientInvoke(mode, value) if mode == "PlayAnimation" and value and ToolEquipped and Humanoid then SetAnimation("PlayAnimation", value) elseif mode == "StopAnimation" and value then SetAnimation("StopAnimation", value) elseif mode == "PlaySound" and value then value:Play() elseif mode == "StopSound" and value then value:Stop() elseif mode == "MousePosition" then return {Position = PlayerMouse.Hit.p, Target = PlayerMouse.Target} end end
ClientControl.OnClientInvoke = OnClientInvoke
Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Mouse_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png" Reloading_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png"
Tool = script.Parent
Mouse = nil
function UpdateIcon() if Mouse then Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and Mouse_Icon or Reloading_Icon end end
function OnEquipped(ToolMouse) Mouse = ToolMouse UpdateIcon() end
Tool:GetPropertyChangedSignal("Enabled"):Connect(UpdateIcon) Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped)
